resources.string:
Add the widget for the goal you want to track here.

You can set the name of your goal and how often you want to reach it here. I recommend to start with a small goal and build a habit of feeling a sense of accomplishment when clicking the widget and seeing that it's green afterwards.

Have fun reaching your goal!
How often do you want to reach your goal? Every
Super awesome that you downloaded WorkoutPixel.\n\nTo start using it, go to your homescreen and add your first WorkoutPixel widget.
You have defined goals that currently don\'t have a widget. You can connect the widget to one of those goals. This takes over all its data including the history.
Do you want to show when you reached your goal the last time?
There is no widget for this goal on your homescreen. You can add a new widget to your homescreen and connect it to this goal or delete it here.
There is no widget for this goal. The app keeps the data because more often than not, a goal gets removed by accident. You can add a new widget to your homescreen and connect it to this goal.
You have never completed this goal. As soon as you click on the widget, the click will show up here.
